name: Bushido Saga: Nightmare of the Samurai
name_original: Bushido Saga: Nightmare of the Samurai
description:
The EPIC Mobile Game, Now on PC!
Relive Bushido Saga - Nightmare of the Samurai with smoother controls, improved gameplay and story in this Definitive Edition for PC. Inspired by the Japanese legend of the forty-seven ronin, embark on an epic quest as honorable samurai, Kuranosuke Oishi, to protect Lord Asano from sinister forces of darkness, while unveiling your own nightmare's mysteries.

Tactical Combat at Your Fingertips

Master swordplay and various weapons, now with precise Keyboard and Mouse and Gamepad Controls. Time your strikes perfectly, face diverse foes, and challenge formidable bosses.

Loot, Upgrade, and Unleash Legends

Collect armor, legendary blades, and mythical swords to customize your samurai. Upgrade and become a true Sword Master.

Embrace the Bushido Code

Venture into the unforgettable saga, interact with NPCs, face challenges, and uncover the truth. Live by courage, loyalty, and honor as you unravel the deadly conspiracy. Your choices shape the fate of Lord Asano.

Witness the Revamped Samurai Saga
Play the definitive version of the beloved mobile game on PC. Immerse in the tale of the forty-seven ronin like never before.
